# Introduction

This document exlores different ways to visualize the response data for the CBE items. 

# Data Vizualizations

```{r, initial, messages=FALSE, warning=FALSE, tidy=TRUE}
# Initialize an empty list to store the results ----
results <- list()

# Load the tidy data ----
readRDS("../data/efa.tidy.rds") -> efa.data

# Load any functions ----
source("../functions/functions.r")

# Load packages ----
pacman::p_load(MplusAutomation, GPArotation, corrplot, psych, tidyverse, lavaan, DT, pander)

# Specific munging and transformations ----
items <- efa.data %>% 
  dplyr::select(-id)

# standardize items
d_items = as.data.frame(scale(items))

# Document options ----
panderOptions('digits', 2)
panderOptions('round', 2)
panderOptions('keep.trailing.zeros', TRUE)
```
